00029 class ACPRequestHolder {
00030 public:
00031    explicit ACPRequestHolder( const TileMapRequest* request );
00032    ACPRequestHolder( const TileMapParams& params,
00033                      const TileMapRequest::TileBuffers& buffers ):
00034       m_params( params ),
00035       m_buffers( buffers ) {
00036    }
00037 
00038    const TileMapParams& getTileMapParams() const {
00039       return m_params;
00040    }
00041 
00042    const TileMapRequest::TileBuffers& getTileMapBufferHolders() {
00043       return m_buffers;
00044    }
00045 
00046 private:
00047    TileMapParams m_params;
00048    TileMapRequest::TileBuffers m_buffers;
00049 };
